name: Classic Pasta Pomodoro
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil; 2 cloves garlic, minced; 4 ripe tomatoes, chopped; 1 tsp salt; 1/2 tsp pepper; 1/4 tsp sugar; 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped; 400g spaghetti
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté garlic until fragrant.; Add chopped tomatoes, salt, pepper, and sugar. Cook for 15-20 minutes.; Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.; Toss the pasta with the sauce, and garnish with basil.

name: Pomodoro with a Twist
ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil; 1 medium onion, diced; 3 cloves garlic, minced; 5 tomatoes, peeled and chopped; 1 tsp red pepper flakes; 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped; 400g penne pasta
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onion until translucent.; Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook for 1 minute.; Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 20 minutes until thickened.; Cook penne pasta, then toss it with the sauce.; Sprinkle with parsley before serving.

name: Vegan Pomodoro Sauce
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil; 1 small onion, diced; 4 cloves garlic, minced; 5 medium tomatoes, chopped; 1 tsp oregano; 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped; 400g fusilli pasta
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onion until soft.; Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.; Stir in chopped tomatoes, oregano, and cook for 15 minutes.; Cook fusilli pasta, then mix with the sauce.; Top with fresh basil.
